features: 【Premium & Sturdy Small Desk】 This small computer desk has an exquisite desktop, it is made of high-quality particleboard which is anti-scratch, waterproof, and easy to clean. This material also meet the EPA and CARB safe air standard, safe for adults and toddlers. The metal frame and corner reinforced structure provide reliable support for all-day use, weight capacity up to 176 Lbs. A must-have small space desk for home office.

【Modern & Simple Style Workstation】Our computer desk is designed in a modern but simple style. It can match all home decor styles and is not easy out of date. The spacious tabletop space makes it easy to contain your PC, laptop, coffee cup, mini plant, keyboard, etc. There are 4 sizes for you to choose from that meet all requirements: 31”, 40”, 47”, and 55”. Choose the smaller size for a bedroom, study room, or corner, and bigger ones for a larger working space.

【Multifunctional Storage Design】These small computer desk for small spaces are designed with a side storage bag and iron headphone hook. You can put your magazine, files, books, and posters in the storage bag, gaining more storage space, and making the desktop tidier. The headphone hook can hang your headphone or bag firmly. Well organize your sundries. Work without mess, work with tidy.

【Wide Application & Great Gift】Sweetcrispy small office desk is perfect for home, office, bedroom, reading room, study room, and so on. 4 sizes for different space demands, and 2 colors for matching various room decoration styles. This home office desk with storage is also a decent gift for your friends or family on festivals, birthday, new year, housewarming, back-to-school day, etc.

【Fast Installation】Easy to assemble, the installation will take 20-30 minutes to complete. The package comes with all the hardware and components you need. Please note read the installation manual at first. No need to hesitate, come and get your small desks for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved into a new apartment and was looking for a computer desk, and this was the perfect match.It's a small-sized table, enough to fit two computer monitors, a keyboard, and maybe a few other items such as books on it. However, it gets the job done. It is a sturdy table that was easy enough to set up, and so far I have no complaints.Would highly recommend this table, especially to those needing it for solely computer work/moving into smaller spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More Space Than You Think
reviews.reviewText: WFH warrior here. Needed a larger desk for my workstation. Previously my laptop sat in front of my secondary monitor with a bit of overlap at the bottom. Enough so that I would have to close my lid a little to see the whole screen. When on zoom calls that means the camera points down to my fat belly. I bought this desk hoping that I could get a little breathing room. That answer is more than enough. I have a 27 inch 4k monitor next to my laptop and my ipad next to the laptop and still have room for a coffee and a plant. Sturdy built no wobble at all, wood looks real. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this computer desk. It’s very sturdy and very easy to put together. Absolutely perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: There were some issues with the stability of the legs. They promptly addressed the issue and resolved it. No existing issues so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for a small room.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for a small room. Super quick shipping and easy to put together. Would buy again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the color of the desk.
reviews.reviewText: The desk was alright to put together, if the Allan wrench had been thicker. It was hard to hang on to. It was a simple desk to put together. The big pocket on the side is nice and the hook is nice to hang my purse on. I use the desk as an extension of my computer desk. The color of the desk top is very pretty. It is a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The edges are not comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk to work from home. While it is sturdy and wasn't that difficult to put together leaning up against while your working hurts. Like you would normally place your arm on against the desk while typing and etc. your not able to do that because the edges all the way around on this desk is uncomfortable and a bit sharp. I had to order rubber off Amazon to place all around the desk so that it's more comfortable. I believe I typed in safety rubber on Amazon and it came right up for me. The rubber protects you against objects or furniture with sharp edges and can be used if someone as " baby proofing" if someone had a toddler. If you're going to buy this desk I would recommend also purchasing that safety rubber. I honestly wished I ordered another desk type/ style but I'll keep this one for now
